original_text: the people of Israel would see the face of Moses, that the skin of Moses' face was shining. And Moses would put the veil over his face again, until he went in to speak with him.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 모세의 얼굴의 광채를 보므로 모세가 여호와께 말하러 들어가기까지 다시 수건으로 자기 얼굴을 가렸더라

sentences.original_text: the people of Israel would see the face of Moses
that the skin of Moses' face was shining
And Moses would put the veil over his face again
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모세는 다시 자신의 얼굴에 수건을 씌웠습니다

sentences.original_text: until he went in to speak with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그와 말하기 위해 들어갈 때까지
